item.title: LinkedIn
item.description: You are redirected to my LinkedIn Page.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: This website uses cookies from Google to enable Google Analytics. According to Google they do not process your personal data to provide me with usage statistics, at least I cannot see them. If you’d prefer to opt-out from your data being collected by Google, install a browser plugin. I personally use uBlock Origin.
